bibl.note: 1. "Samion", a wine measure. O. Mich. I, 249. - 2. A receipt for "eikoste". O. Mich. I, 133. - 3. The price of wheat in 276 A.D. O. Mich. I, 157. - 4. "Ibion Argaiou". O. Mich.
